item.title: Sunken paving slab, 17th September
item.description:
Just outside 5 Cross Road, N11 there is a sunken paving slab. This is a major tripping hazard where the road is used frequently by school children and local residents

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9-16, Cross Road, New Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: X9 Union Jack flags attached to street lights, 17th September
item.description:
Morning, Iâ€™ve noticed flags on Willow Grove on lamp Posts. Can they be removed? I understand and accept that people have a right to show their support and allegiance to a facist/racist/patriotic movement by flying flags on their own property. They abruptly stop at the house flying the White Ensign, they must be proud Navy folk. I was rather proud of the neutral stance Chislehurst residence took regarding these troubling times. What next?, painting a Red Cross on our mini roundabouts. Look forward to hearing from you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Grove, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
